duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through effective business to business sales and lead generation.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to promote and sell products and services.
Maintain client relationships and drive future revenue growth.
Use compelling and persuasive communication to bring concepts to life and consistently achieve sales targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
